Title: Establishes state procurement goals for New York state products throughout state agencies and private entities performing state contracts
Summary: Establishes state procurement goals for New York state products throughout state agencies and private entities performing state contracts; provides that every year after enactment, a certain percentage of products purchased by state agencies will be New York state products, with such percentage threshold increasing each year up until five years.
LawCode: Add ยง163-e, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing state procurement goals for New York state products throughout state agencies and private entities performing state contracts
